name: plug.dj - Transparent dialog boxes
description:
This style makes the dialog boxes in plug.dj transparent in colour.

You'll want this if you're tired of the dialog boxes obscuring the video player and other elements that are normally hidden behind these boxes. This style also includes various interface enhancements that may be desired by an end-user.
obsoletion_message: plug.dj is now a Rowl-owned asset, and has returned to business.
additional_info: Information Also see these other styles; Transparent UI Transparent buttons and menus Transparent playlist and user menus Transparent dashboard and store Transparent miscellany Following the theme of all the other transparent interface hacks I made, every possible dialog accessible by non-administrative users (which is a fair bit) has a half-transparent black background, with less transparent buttons and interface elements all around. It covers the user-level gamut from having room moderation privileges to being disconnected or banned. This style also, like all the other transparent UI styles swap button background image (gradient) with button text colour, as well, disabled buttons have no text colour (substituted with text-shadow alone) and as a special addition, applies an orange box-shadow border to the delete playlist text input field, and any fields that are empty or invalid. Nothing else needs to be used with this style for best effect. 12/10/14.1 Initial release 12/10/14.2 Fixed box shadows so they appear on all three of the mute and ban duration buttons, as well, how the box shadow in the playlist delete input box appears. 12/11/14 Tightened the length of the code by being less specific with what is affected, added items specific to Create Community, extended orange box shadow to all dialog boxes with invalid specifications. 12/13/14.1 Added code for registration box. 12/13/14.2 Added playlist create text 12/17/14 Added new code that pertained to this style, to accommodate for the recent interface update. 12/18/14 Added plug notes button text 12/25/14 Holiday update! Includes Radiant Community Script and the level up dialogs, also rearranges the code somewhat to appear more orderly. 12/31/14 New year's update! Code modified to include different settings for #dialog-purchase based on either avatar or name change purchase, and some other code fixes. 02/11/15 Added classes for gifting stuff. 03/18/15 Added more RCS stuff. 04/10/15 Long-overdue update adding transparency to the username box for changing usernames, and also adding a special text colour for the subscribe button in dialogs for people who haven't been gifted a subscription after the end of plug notes. 06/20/15 Added the new signup dialog for guest users. Mostly unnecessary, there to be there.
